attributes.action: Neighbourhood Traffic Calming Campaign at Kings Priory School, Percy Park Road, Tynemouth
attributes.additional_details:
We wish to campaign for a lollipop person, traffic lights or speed bumps to calm the traffic on Percy Park Road for the safety of children accessing Kings Priory School.

There is heavy traffic on this road, often driving at higher speeds which may lead to an accident. The area is highly residential.
